mapper.insert: insert into BJ_USER (USER_ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASS_WORD, USER_NAME, MOBILE_NO, USER_STATUS, OPEN_TIME, OPEN_USER_ID, ADMIN_LEVEL, ORGE_ID, ROLE_CODE, DATA_EXT, DATA_EXT2, UP_TIME, ERR_NUM, ERR_TIME) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adminLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataExt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataExt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{errNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{errTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update BJ_USER set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_WORD = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_NO = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPEN_TIME = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPEN_USER_ID = #{openUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADMIN_LEVEL = #{adminLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORGE_ID = #{orgeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_EXT = #{dataExt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_EXT2 = #{dataExt2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_TIME = #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ERR_NUM = #{errNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERR_TIME = #{errTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASS_WORD, USER_NAME, MOBILE_NO, USER_STATUS, OPEN_TIME, OPEN_USER_ID, ADMIN_LEVEL, ORGE_ID, ROLE_CODE, DATA_EXT, DATA_EXT2, UP_TIME, ERR_NUM, ERR_TIME from BJ_USER where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select USER_ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASS_WORD, USER_NAME, MOBILE_NO, USER_STATUS, OPEN_TIME, OPEN_USER_ID, ADMIN_LEVEL, ORGE_ID, ROLE_CODE, DATA_EXT, DATA_EXT2, UP_TIME, ERR_NUM, ERR_TIME from BJ_USER
